content: craft up some spooky décor with this finger-crocheted pumpkin stitched in bernat blanket extra thick this plush pumpkin is made with just your fingers no tool required easy and fun to make you ll learn finger crochet slip_stitch in back loop and chain techniques measuring 11 in diameter x 8 tall make a bold statement of the season with the rustic charm of this one-of-a-kind creation materials bernat® blanket extra thick™ 21 2 oz/600 g 72 yds/66 m pumpkin 62086 or vintage white 62008 1 ball or 55 yds/51 m measurements approximately 11 28 cm diameter x 8 20 5 cm tall excluding stem
